Smart Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger with built-in sensors that can detect when an item of clothing is placed on or removed from the hanger. It can then use this information to automatically adjust the temperature, humidity, and lighting in the closet to create the optimal conditions for preserving the clothing's texture, color, and longevity.

Hanger with a Twist: A clothes hanger with a unique design that allows it to hold garments in a way that minimizes wrinkles and creases. Instead of the traditional hooks or bars, this hanger features a series of interconnected loops that cradle the garment, allowing it to hang smoothly and flat.

AI-Powered Hanger: A clothes hanger with integrated artificial intelligence that can analyze the garments in the closet and provide personalized recommendations for styling and care. Using computer vision and machine learning algorithms, the hanger can identify patterns, colors, and fabrics, and suggest complementary outfits, as well as provide guidance on how to properly care for each garment.

Smart Mirror Hanger: A clothes hanger that doubles as a smart mirror, allowing users to see themselves in real-time while trying on different outfits. The hanger features a built-in camera and screen, which can display a live feed of the user's reflection, allowing them to check their appearance and make adjustments without having to physically look in a mirror.

Augmented Reality Hanger: A clothes hanger that uses augmented reality technology to bring the garments in the closet to life. Using a mobile app, users can hold up their clothes to the hanger and see a virtual representation of the garment on their body, allowing them to try on different outfits and see how they would look without having to physically change clothes. This can be especially useful for online shopping, as users can get a better sense of how an item would fit and look without having to wait for it to arrive.
